content: What popular video game franchise features an Italian plumber named Mario?

The popular video game franchise that features an Italian plumber named Mario is called "Super Mario." It was created by Nintendo and was first introduced in the game "Donkey Kong" in 1981, where Mario was originally known as "Jumpman." However, he gained widespread recognition as Mario in the 1985 game "Super Mario Bros.," which was released for the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES). Since then, Mario has become one of the most iconic and recognizable characters in video game history, appearing in numerous games across various platforms.
